page.title: 11Church Choir
page.content: There are two churches in Steeple Morden,one church is called St. Peter & St. Paul and a chapel which isn't very well attended,we usually practice in the chapel but if we have a service due we practice in the churcwell attended,we usually practice in the chapel but if we have a service due we practice in the churches,most of our services are in Litlington Church which is called St. Catherine. The church is near some old peoples' homes and the old people like to see the choir singing in all our robes and it is very good for them because the church is near to them. The choir is very old because near the choir seats there is a flag which is very old and fragile which says Steeple Morden choir.
